project_overview.description: 100% private send cryptocurrency using zk-SNARKs to shield 100% of peer-to-peer transactions on the blockchain making for highly anonymous and private transactions
project_overview.launch_story: Originated from a Discord conversation among Komodo community developers who initiated an independent asset chain using Komodo Platform's technology

sources.note: 403 error encountered, data from WebSearch summary

technology.description: Privacy-focused cryptocurrency utilizing zk-SNARKs from Zcash, Sapling protocol from Zcash, and delayed Proof of Work (dPoW) from Komodo. Enforces mandatory privacy for all transactions.
technology.privacy_mechanism: zk-SNARKs (Zero-Knowledge Succinct Non-Interactive Argument of Knowledge)

key_innovations.description: Unlike other privacy coins with optional privacy, Pirate Chain enforces privacy for ALL transactions - no transparent transactions allowed
Uses zero-knowledge succinct non-interactive arguments of knowledge from Zcash to fully shield all transactions
Notarizes Pirate Chain's blocks onto both Komodo and Litecoin blockchains, making it highly resistant to 51% attacks
Implements Zcash's Sapling shielded payment protocol for improved performance

sources: WebSearch results on Pirate Chain technology

team_and_governance.governance_model: 100% open source and community driven by dedicated and passionate volunteers

leadership.name: Thomas M
leadership.note: Name from Tracxn, limited verification available

leadership.name: John McAfee
leadership.background: Entrepreneur and computer programmer, founder of McAfee antivirus software
leadership.note: Deceased 2021, early supporter/advisor role unclear vs founder role

leadership.name: Jeff Berwick
leadership.note: Known promoter, exact founding role requires verification

key_contributors.name: ComputerGenie
key_contributors.role: Developer, NN Operator, Solo Pool Owner
key_contributors.description: Massive supporter from the beginning, created the Pirate Ocean wallet

team_and_governance.team_background_note: Talent pool includes Bitcoin core contributors, developers from Zcash, Monero and Komodo, website and SEO experts
team_and_governance.launch_model: Fair launch - no ICO, no premine, 0 dev fees
sources: WebSearch results on Pirate Chain team

funding.note: Fair launch model with no institutional funding identified

milestones.description: Independent asset chain initiated by Komodo community developers
ARRR reached $16.90, peak of market adoption

blockchain_security.security_layer: Delayed Proof of Work (dPoW) with Komodo and Litecoin blockchain notarization

security_gaps.reason: No formal security audit information found in available sources
No bug bounty program information found

privacy_features.privacy_vs_competitors: Unlike other privacy coins with optional privacy (creating metadata leaks), Pirate Chain enforces mandatory privacy on all transactions
sources: WebSearch results on Pirate Chain privacy features

gaps_and_missing_data.reason: Pirate Chain is NOT an Ethereum-based project - it is an independent blockchain based on Komodo Platform. No Ethereum contracts exist.
gaps_and_missing_data.note: This is NOT a gap - Pirate Chain is its own blockchain, not an ERC-20 token

gaps_and_missing_data.reason: No institutional investors or funding rounds identified. Fair launch model with no ICO/premine suggests no traditional funding

overall_assessment.data_quality: Good quality data from multiple independent sources including GitHub (primary source), market data aggregators (CoinMarketCap), and WebSearch results. Web access limitations prevented full documentation review.
overall_assessment.verification_method: Cross-referenced data from GitHub repository, market data sites, company profiles, and web search results. Technical specifications verified from GitHub README and repository data.
limitations: Team page access limited due to web permissions
Social media metrics not retrieved due to access issues
Later research phase experienced tool permission errors
strengths: Multiple market data aggregators confirm basic facts
Privacy features clearly described across sources
overall_assessment.note: Pirate Chain is NOT an Ethereum ecosystem project - it is an independent blockchain based on Komodo Platform technology. Classification as 'Ethereum ecosystem' in research request is incorrect.

data_collection_methods: Web search for team and technical information
Attempted access to official website and documentation
